effect.sun_moon: Raises the user’s Speed by two stages. Halves the user’s weight; this effect does not stack.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Raises the user’s Speed by two stages. Halves the user’s weight; this effect does not stack.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Raises the user’s Speed by two stages. Halves the user’s weight; this effect does not stack.

short_effect.sun_moon: Raises the user’s Speed by two stages and halves the user’s weight.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Raises the user’s Speed by two stages and halves the user’s weight.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Raises the user’s Speed by two stages and halves the user’s weight.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user sheds part of its body to make itself lighter and sharply raise its Speed stat.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user sheds part of its body to make itself lighter and sharply raise its Speed stat.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user sheds part of its body to make itself lighter and sharply raise its Speed stat.
